summary: This mod expands the equipment and weapons that you can choose from at the very start of the game within Helgen Keep. This mod adds a full set of heavy and light armor as well as heavy and light shield, one handed weapon, two handed weapon, a bow and spell tomes for Alteration, Illusion and Conjuration. Start leveling how you want right away!
descriptionHtml:
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[size=4]Description[/size]
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This mod expands the equipment and weapons that you can choose from at the very start of the game within Helgen Keep. This mod adds a full set of heavy and light armor as well as heavy and light shield, one handed weapon, two handed weapon and a bow. There are also spell tomes for Illusion (Courage), Alteration (Oakflesh) and Conjuration (Summon Familiar). Now you can choose either Stormcloak or Imperial and start leveling with the equipment you want right away!

The inspiration came from always playing a heavy armor warrior and having to choose to accompany the Stormcloaks in order to get heavy armor when I'd rather be an Imperial.

[size=4]Full list of Equipment:[/size]

[size=4][u]Imperial[/u][/size]
Imperial Heavy Set
Imperial Light Set
Hide Shield
Iron Greatsword
Iron Sword
Long Bow
Iron Arrows x50
Spell Tome: Conjure Familiar
Spell Tome: Oakflesh
Spell Tome: Courage

[size=4][u]Stormcloak[/u][/size]
Iron Armor Set
Stormcloak Set
Hide Shield
Iron Shield
Iron Battleaxe
Iron War Axe
Long Bow
Iron Arrows x50
Spell Tome: Conjure Familiar
Spell Tome: Oakflesh
Spell Tome: Courage

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[size=4]Compatibility[/size]
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
ESE should work with all existing mods except those that edit the Chest (MQ101WardenChest) and Gunjar (MQ101CorpseSons01) but none exists that I know of.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[size=4]Installation[/size]
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[size=4][u]With Nexus Mod Manager[/u][/size]
1. Click "Download with Manager" button.
2. Activate the mod to install.

[size=4][u]Manual Install[/u][/size]
1. Extract the zip file
2. Inside the extracted folder, Copy the ExpandedStartingEquipment.esp and paste it in your SkyrimData folder.

[size=4][u]Upgrade[/u][/size]
1. Juts copy and paste ExpandedStartingEquipment.esp from the updated version into the Data folder and override the old file.

[size=4][u]Uninstall[/u][/size]
Delete ExpandedStartingEquipment.esp from the SkyrimData folder.

Now uploaded to the Steam Workshop for download.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[size=4]Other Mods by Me[/size]
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35372]Dragonwrath, Tarecgosa's Rest
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/1883/?]Expanded Starting Equipment (Special Edition)[/url]

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[size=4]Change Log[/size]
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[size=4][u]Version 1.3[/u][/size]
-Removed the extra set of the Stormcloak Cuirass and Stormcloak Boots on Gunjur.
-Added back the Iron Set to Gunjar. Just in case you get hit in the first skirmish.
-Moved the Imperial Light Helmet and Imperial Light Gauntlets from the separate chests (MQ101BarracksChest01, MQ101BarracksChest02).

[size=4][u]Version 1.2[/u][/size]
-Removed various items to be more in line with the equipment you start with in the vanilla game.
-Removed Iron Set from Stormcloaks
-Removed Imperial Gloves
-Removed Stormcloak Gloves

[size=4][u]Version 1.1[/u][/size]
-Added Spell Tome: Conjure Familiar
-Added Spell Tome: Courage
-Added Spell Tome: Oakflesh

[size=4][u]Version 1.0[/u][/size]
-Initial Release
author: OozyGorilla
